name: Scroll Top Advanced – Scroll to ID or Class
author: Nasir

sections.description:
Scroll Top Advance plugin allows the visitor to easily scroll back to the top of the page. It is based on pure CSS3 with multi effects, icons and custom setting Scroll Top – It is compatible with all modern web browsers

Click Here For DEMO

Contact For Any Suggestion:- nasir179125@gmail.com

Language

  • English

Features

  • Move to Custom “ID” or “Class”
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • Custom Text
  • Custom Image
  • 99+ Default Images
  • Unlimited Color Variations
  • 35+ CSS3 Animations
  • Color, Background Color, Opacity
  • Page Scroll Speed
  • Button Styles
  • Square, Round, Diamond
  • Custom Positions
  • Scroll Visibility
  • Show/Hide on Mobile
  • Replace text with icon (Optional)
  • 100% Responsive
sections.installation:
1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘Scroll Top Advanced’ and install it
  3. Go to ‘Scroll Top’ on left side of dashboard
  4. Fill some additional informations.
  5. Now visit your site

  • Bug fixes

2.2

  • Bug fixes

2.0

  • Square Button Style
  • More Button Positions
  • More Button Positions
  • Background Color on Hover

short_description: 99+ Pre Designs allows the visitor to easily scroll back to the top of the page, also navigate to the specific "ID" or "class".
